channel.title: Npcdef.xml help!
channel.description:
i edited the npcdef.xml..i changed some names changed drop rates etc and then i compressed then took the .gz file and replaced and the edits aren't showing up
tried 2 times..its just like editing npcloc.xml isnt it?
also my banner isnt showing up in my forums i had it working before but i had to start over and i put the image in www/img and i named it banner.gif made the format gif etc..even restarted wamp still wont show up
if someone could help me with these problems i would really appreciate it =]
